languages.text: {n}Пока Ханн говорит, остальные глядят на вас с угрюмым напряжением. Вблизи видно, что все до единого — мутанты. Их лица и тела несут след невероятно уродливых искажений, таких же, как и у бормочущих безумцев, атаковавших вас. Однако взгляды у соратников Ханна вполне осмысленные.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Пока Ханн говорит, остальные собираются за его спиной, глядя на вас с угрюмым напряжением. Вблизи видно, что все до единого — мутанты. Их лица и тела несут след невероятно уродливых искажений, таких же, как и у бормочущих безумцев, атаковавших вас. Однако взгляды у соратников Ханна вполне осмысленные.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: {n}As Hann speaks, others glare at you with dour tension. Up close, you can plainly see that every one of them is a mutant. Their faces and bodies bear the mark of incredibly grotesque deformities, the same as the muttering madmen who attacked you. However, Hann's associates seem perfectly clear-eyed, showing no signs of madness.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Пока Ханн говорит, остальные глядят на вас с угрюмым напряжением. Вблизи видно, что все до единого — мутанты. Их лица и тела несут след невероятно уродливых искажений, таких же, как и у бормочущих безумцев, атаковавших вас. Однако взгляды у соратников Ханна вполне осмысленные.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}As Hann speaks, others gather behind his back, glaring at you with dour tension. Up close, you can plainly see that every one of them is a mutant. Their faces and bodies bear the mark of incredibly grotesque deformities, the same as the muttering madmen who attacked you. However, the eyes of Hann's associates seem perfectly sane.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

Their faces and bodies bear the mark of incredibly grotesque deformities, the same as the muttering madmen who attacked you. However, Hann's associates seem perfectly clear-eyed, showing no signs of madness.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: {n}ハンが喋ると、他の者たちは気難しそうな緊張感でこちらを見つめた。よく見ると、全員が変異体であることは明らかだ。顔や身体には自分を襲った狂人たちと同じように、とてつもなくグロテスクな変形の跡がある。しかし、ハンの仲間たちは狂気の気配をまったく感じさせない澄んだ眼をしている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As Hann speaks, others glare at you with dour tension. Up close, you can plainly see that every one of them is a mutant. Their faces and bodies bear the mark of incredibly grotesque deformities, the same as the muttering madmen who attacked you. However, Hann's associates seem perfectly clear-eyed, showing no signs of madness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハンが喋ると、他の者たちは気難しそうな緊張感でこちらを見つめた。よく見ると、全員が変異体であることは明らかだ。顔や身体には自分を襲った狂人たちと同じように、とてつもなくグロテスクな変形の跡がある。しかし、ハンの仲間たちは狂気の気配をまったく感じさせない澄んだ眼をしている。{/n}
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: {n}汉恩说话的时候，其他人都在盯着你，神色无比紧张。如果仔细看看的话，你可以清楚看到他们每个人都是变种人。他们的脸和身体都出现了怪诞的畸变，与那些袭击你的疯子们一样，不过，他们却似乎非常清醒，没有表现出任何疯狂的迹象。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As Hann speaks, others glare at you with dour tension. Up close, you can plainly see that every one of them is a mutant. Their faces and bodies bear the mark of incredibly grotesque deformities, the same as the muttering madmen who attacked you. However, Hann's associates seem perfectly clear-eyed, showing no signs of madness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}汉恩说话的时候，其他人都在盯着你，深色无比紧张。如果仔细看看的话，你可以清楚看到他们每个人都是变种人。他们的脸和身体都出现了怪诞的畸变，与那些袭击你的疯子们一样，不过，他们却似乎非常清醒，没有表现出任何疯狂的迹象。{/n}
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: {n}Conforme Hann habla, los otros te miran con sombría tensión. De cerca, puedes ver que todos y cada uno de ellos son mutantes. Sus caras y cuerpos llevan la marca de una serie de deformidades grotescas idénticas a las de los lunáticos farfullantes que te han atacado. Sin embargo, los acompañantes de Hann parecen disfrutar de claridad mental y no muestran señal alguna de locura.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As Hann speaks, others glare at you with dour tension. Up close, you can plainly see that every one of them is a mutant. Their faces and bodies bear the mark of incredibly grotesque deformities, the same as the muttering madmen who attacked you. However, Hann's associates seem perfectly clear-eyed, showing no signs of madness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Conforme Hann habla, los otros te miran con sombría tensión. De cerca, puedes ver que todos y cada uno de ellos son mutantes. Sus caras y cuerpos llevan la marca de una serie de deformidades grotescas idénticas a las de los lunáticos farfullantes que te han atacado. Sin embargo, los acompañantes de Hann parecen disfrutar de claridad mental y no muestran señal alguna de locura.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: {n}Tandis que Hann s'exprime, d'autres vous observent fixement, l'air tendu et renfrogné. En les regardant de plus près, vous remarquez que tous dans l'assemblée sont des mutants : leur visage et leur corps sont criblés de difformités grotesques, identiques à celles des fous marmonneurs qui vous ont {mf|attaqué|attaquée}. Cependant, les associés de Hann semblent pour leur part parfaitement lucides, sans le moindre signe de démence.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As Hann speaks, others glare at you with dour tension. Up close, you can plainly see that every one of them is a mutant. Their faces and bodies bear the mark of incredibly grotesque deformities, the same as the muttering madmen who attacked you. However, Hann's associates seem perfectly clear-eyed, showing no signs of madness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tandis que Hann s'exprime, d'autres vous observent fixement, l'air tendu et renfrogné. En les regardant de plus près, vous remarquez que tous dans l'assemblée sont des mutants : leur visage et leur corps sont criblés de difformités grotesques, identiques à celles des fous marmonneurs qui vous ont {mf|attaqué|attaquée}. Cependant, les associés de Hann semblent pour leur part parfaitement lucides, sans le moindre signe de démence.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: {n}Während Hann spricht, starren dich andere missmutig und angespannt an. Aus der Nähe ist klar erkennbar, dass sie alle Mutanten sind. Ihre Gesichter und Körper weisen unfassbar groteske Deformationen auf, genau wie die murmelnden Wahnsinnigen, die dich angegriffen haben. Allerdings haben Hanns Gefährten einen völlig klaren Blick und zeigen kein Anzeichen von Wahnsinn.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As Hann speaks, others glare at you with dour tension. Up close, you can plainly see that every one of them is a mutant. Their faces and bodies bear the mark of incredibly grotesque deformities, the same as the muttering madmen who attacked you. However, Hann's associates seem perfectly clear-eyed, showing no signs of madness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Während Hann spricht, starren dich andere missmutig und angespannt an. Aus der Nähe ist klar erkennbar, dass sie alle Mutanten sind. Ihre Gesichter und Körper weisen unfassbar groteske Deformationen auf, genau wie die murmelnden Wahnsinnigen, die dich angegriffen haben. Allerdings haben Hanns Gefährten einen völlig klaren Blick und zeigen kein Anzeichen von Wahnsinn.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: {n}Hann konuşurken yanındakiler seni haşin bakışlarla izliyor. Yakından baktığında her birinin birer mutant olduğunu açıkça görebiliyorsun. Yüzleri ve bedenleri, tıpkı sana saldıran kendini kaybetmiş delilerdeki gibi inanılmaz grotesk bozulmaların izlerini taşıyor. Onlardan farklı olarak Hann'ın yanındakilerin bakışları gayet temiz, herhangi bir delilik ibaresi sergilemiyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As Hann speaks, others glare at you with dour tension. Up close, you can plainly see that every one of them is a mutant. Their faces and bodies bear the mark of incredibly grotesque deformities, the same as the muttering madmen who attacked you. However, Hann's associates seem perfectly clear-eyed, showing no signs of madness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hann konuşurken diğerleri seni haşin bakışlarla izliyor. Yakından baktığında her birinin birer mutant olduğunu açıkça görebiliyorsun. Yüzleri ve bedenleri, tıpkı sana saldıran kendini kaybetmiş delilerde olduğu gibi inanılmaz grotesk bozulmaların izlerini taşıyor ancak Hann'ın yanındakilerin bakışları gayet temiz ve herhangi bir delilik ibaresi sergilemiyorlar.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator
